mapper.select: select e.tag_name, count(e.tag_id) as tag_id from card_tag c, tag e, (select card_id from card e, (select cardlist_id, b.board_date from cardlist c, (select board_id, board_date from board where mem_id = #{mem_id} and board_type='daily' and board_date between #{from} and #{to}) b where c.board_id = b.board_id) d where e.cardlist_id = d.cardlist_id and card_secret = true) d where c.card_id = d.card_id and c.tag_id = e.tag_id group by e.tag_id;

select e.tag_name, count(e.tag_id) as tag_id from card_tag c, tag e, (select card_id from card e, (select cardlist_id, b.board_date from cardlist c, (select board_id, board_date from board where mem_id = #{mem_id} and board_type='daily' and board_date between #{from} and #{to}) b where c.board_id = b.board_id) d where e.cardlist_id = d.cardlist_id and card_secret = false) d where c.card_id = d.card_id and c.tag_id = e.tag_id group by e.tag_id;
